item.title: How to Extract Structured Data From Images Using Ollama in .NET
item.description: Vision models can do more than describe images. I used Ollama and Microsoft.Extensions.AI to extract structured receipt data into strongly typed C# objects, all running locally. Link to article: https://www.milanjovanovic.tech/blog/how-to-extract-structured-data-from-images-using-ollama-in-dotnet
